        city, country

    • Method Detail

      • tryCountry

        Optional<CountryResponse> tryCountry​(InetAddress ipAddress)
                              throws IOException,
                                     GeoIp2Exception
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - IPv4 or IPv6 address to lookup.
        Returns:
        A Country model for the requested IP address or empty if the IP address is not in the DB.
        Throws:
        GeoIp2Exception - if there is an error looking up the IP
        IOException - if there is an IO error
